actions.name: Solar Power
actions.description: Effect: While Sunny Weather is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50%. In Sunny Weather, the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their Activations. The user is considered Fire Type for the effects of Sunny Weather.
